attributes.title: ✨p o o p o o ✨
attributes.review: hey remeber that one time that you were like “hey lets take down tiktok” well i hate to break it to you but you are gonna regret that, generation z has united with kpop fans and tiktok users who dont want the app that they built a community on to fall.  Maybe think twice if you want to take something from us☺️✨💜

attributes.title: Completely dissapointed
attributes.review: I opened the app the see an an orange, u was somewhat concerned. I expected to see trump not fruit. Anyways the moment I started using it the app began glitching. I think my FBI agent is a bit concerned with me. I do not recommend purchasing this app whatsoever. It’s complete trash. That orange also belongs in the trash

attributes.title: TikTok
attributes.review: the fact the app has been crashing and wanting to see whats going on with the world today. he had to make an app really i thought we were supposed to focus on the future why cant he get his self off the media and fix this🤷🏽‍♀️🤷🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: Hate it
attributes.review: This app is horrible it shouldn’t even be up and they should take it down rn!!!! And I don’t y defat and y apps r being taken down just because of Donald in China it’s not worth it we need to keep these apps up and do something with this app take this app down right now!!!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and the second it was on my phone ,every other app started glitching and I had to get a whole new phone!🙈all I wanted was to support my wonderful president ❤️some advice to his team....take the app down ASAP before it ruins everyone’s cellular devices😱like it did mine.

attributes.title: Where’s my storage?
attributes.review: I’m a trump supporter all the way, but this app i ineffective. It took up ALL of my storage and started deleting all of my apps. I would give this app 1/10😾. I’m very angry right now because I cannot log onto Facebook anymore. I don’t remember my password. Do better trump!

attributes.title: No good app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see how the Orange is doing, but as soon as I opened the app, my dog started having a seizure! I closed the app and a few minutes later I tried to open it again and my microwave exploded! I am sure that Trump is behind all of this, so this app deserves 1 star😠

attributes.title: THE WORST
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app a bald eagle flew threw my window and ate my baby because she was black. When I tried to contact Donald trump about this he said the baby deserved it because we are thugs. My baby then evaporated and he forced me to inhale the fumes. Ngl i was high as balls on baby steam but that was the only good that that came out of it.

attributes.title: Wish I could give this 0 stars
attributes.review: I usually don’t leave reviews but I had to for this one. I didn’t have high hopes for this app to begin with but WOW this is terrible. Not user friendly at all and keep shutting off. Also I think this app gave my phone the corona virus.

attributes.title: this is embarrassing and awful
attributes.review: if i could give this app 0 stars i would...i download to try and educate myself about our president but i’ve never been more disappointed in an app and a person who happens to run our country. Never get this app.
